mapper.insert: insert into empdata (empCd,name, birthday, nationalityCd, genderCd) values (#{empCd},#{name},#{birthday},#{nationalityCd},#{genderCd})
mapper.select: select empdata.*,g.genderName,n.nationalityName from empdata join gender g on empdata.genderCd = g.genderCd join nationality n on n.nationalityCd = empdata.nationalityCd order by empCd

select empdata.*,g.genderName,n.nationalityName from empdata join gender g on empdata.genderCd = g.genderCd join nationality n on n.nationalityCd = empdata.nationalityCd where name like concat('%',#{value},'%')
